ygData.subject: The minion and Zardus
ygData.msgSnippet: The minion worked hard in his lab. The base creaked from non use and ignorement. he was disgusted by it. If his master had been here he would have never let it

Subject: The minion and Zardus

--part1_104.7703739.28a59000_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


The minion worked hard in his lab. The base creaked from non use and 
ignorement. he was disgusted by it. If his master had been here he would   
have never let it happen. The body was almost complete. It now only needed 
its fule. The blood of a few hero bots to bring it to full power. He felt the 
dark spark's precense. "Its almost ready master. Do you wish to have all the 
weapons you had before?" The dark sent a obvious yes to the bots frightened 
face. The dark spark pulsed over and over. He would soon be back and he would 
set fire to the entire world if he had to to bring about his enemies. But 
first he had to make a few allies. Brother Megatron had already been 
contacted. But another one he would soon need to speak with was Zardus. he 
sent a typed message to his opticals. For he yet to have form so a visual 
seems impossible. The typed message would read. "Great leader of the 
alliance. I have never met you in person but we have spoken. I have long been 
very impressed by your skills as a leader. But defending the maximals I was 
quite surprised by that. Non the less I am very interested to work with you. 
Unfortunatly I am not complete but I will be soon. I will contact you then. 
Until then good luck." The message ended and the dark spark waited for his 
body to be finished. For when it was the world would never be the same again



--part1_104.7703739.28a59000_boundary
